EcommerceStrategyGrid.title: Do You Want to Conquer the Online Market with a {br} High-Performance E-commerce Site?

items.title: Technical Development and SEO Optimization
items.description: Our approach combines robust architecture and advanced SEO strategies for tangible results.
points: Custom Development: E-commerce platforms optimized for search engines.
Responsive and Intuitive Design: Mobile-first interfaces, smooth navigation.
Secure Integration: Encrypted payments (CMI, PayPal), inventory management.
Technical Optimization: Semantic HTML tagging, meta-descriptions.

items.title: Conversion-Centered Design
items.description: A successful e-commerce site transforms visitors into loyal customers.
points: Premium User Experience: Simplified customer journey.
Impactful Visual Identity: Design aligned with your brand.
Strategic Call-to-Action: Incentivizing buttons placed at key points.
A/B Testing: Continuous optimization of the sales funnel.

items.title: Analysis & Strategy
items.description: Before developing, we analyze your sector and your competitors.
points: Technical Audit & Objectives: Identification of SEO opportunities.
Competitive Benchmark: Study of best practices.
Agile Planning: Development calendar and deliveries.
Buyer Personas: Adapting the design to the target profile.

items.title: Optimization & Performance
items.description: We guarantee always competitive e-commerce sites.
points: Real-Time Analysis: Tracking traffic and average basket.
Proactive Maintenance: Technical updates and corrections.
GDPR & Security: Legal compliance and data protection.

EcommerceFAQ.title: Explore the {br} Frequently Asked {br} Questions.

items.question: Why is it important to have an e-commerce site?
items.answer: Having an e-commerce site allows you to reach a wider audience, increase your online sales and offer your products 24/7.

items.question: How much does it cost to create an e-commerce site?
items.answer: The cost varies depending on the complexity of the project. We offer solutions adapted to all budgets, from the Shopify site to the custom-made.

items.question: What is the best e-commerce platform?
items.answer: It depends on your goals. Shopify is excellent for a quick launch, WooCommerce offers total flexibility.

items.question: How long does it take to create a shop?
items.answer: On average, an e-commerce project takes between 4 to 8 weeks, from design to launch.

items.question: How to optimize my site for SEO?
items.answer: We optimize the technical structure, product files, meta-data and internal linking.
